plot: A rich businessman is fed up with work, family, society, and goes with a friend to Africa, in search of another friend who had vanished there in mysterious circumstances. They will find him...
title: Riusciranno i nostri eroi a ritrovare l'amico misteriosamente scomparso in Africa?
plot_es: A rich businessman is fed up with work, family, society, and goes with a friend to Africa, in search of another friend who had vanished there in mysterious circumstances. They will find him...
original_name: Riusciranno i nostri eroi a ritrovare l'amico misteriosamente scomparso in Africa?
